metadata.title: CVE-2019-20934 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.2.6. On NUMA systems,the Linux fair scheduler has a use-after-free in show_numa_stats() becauseNUMA fault statistics are inappropriately freed, aka CID-16d51a590a8c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
